新的 Whiffy Recon 恶意软件使用 WiFi 来三角测量您的位置https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/new-whiffy-recon-malware-uses-wifi-to-triangulate-your-location/ Thu, 24 Aug 2023 11:36:57 -0400比尔·图拉斯Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/new-whiffy-recon-malware-uses-wifi-to-triangulate-your-location/ Cybercriminals behind the Smoke Loader botnet are using a new piece of malware called Whiffy Recon to triangulate the location of infected devices through WiFi scanning and Google's geolocation API.
